run.lit: Breakdown of the main actions needed starting from the registration of a survey into the system, until the obtention of a cleaned dataset in the aggregated data store.
Determine the general structure and workflow governing in the data dictionary.
Graph structure: determine the distinct predicates and the graph structure needed to represent controlled vocabularies, structures, forms and other types of relationships.
Determine which components are needed to implement the data dictionary.
Test a series of use-cases and collect the necessary elements needed to express all aspects of descriptor data types, definitions and implementation as database keys.

task.title: Build a conceptual prototype of the data dictionary components

run.lit: Determine the components and rules governing the data dictionary.
Determine the rules and structure of the data dictionary terms.
Enumerations, templates, categories, terms, classes, structures, forms, collections and other term types.
Determine the rules and structure of the data dictionary descriptors.
Create schema for descriptors based on their data type.

task.title: Update census of required classes from data standards.

run.lit: During the compilation of data standards
Determine the base rules and behaviour of schema edge objects.
Design the schema and workflow for enumerations, controlled vocabulary templates, categories and choices, class and structure relationships, form and output reports.
Apply use cases to the model and refine the model.
Compile and test a set of queries in the database to test the model.
Refine the model and repeat until effective.
Create a list of terms, descriptors and schema relationships that constitute the base of the data dictionary.

task.title: Load data dictionary components in database

run.lit: Load terms, descriptors and edges in database.
Develop scripts to automate and validate data dictionary elements.
Perform tests on data dictionary functions.
Add required elements depending on specific use cases.
Compile and test queries for traversing controlled vocabularies
Compile and test queries to traverse classes and structures.
Compile and test form structures and layouts.
Find clean and load standard data.
Compile and load ISO language, currency and country administrative units.
Develop scripts to automatically update standards.
Compile and load Geonames and GEOnet toponyms.
Develop scripts to automatically update standards.

task.title: Test and stress with standard data

run.lit: Perform stress queries using standard data.
Determine structures and forms needed to implement user management.
Determine authentication strategy.
Distribute responsibility between database API services and web site API services.
Implement database micro-services for user management.
Implement micro-services for the creation of new users.
Implement micro-services for the registration of new users.
Implement micro-services for user login.
Implement micro-services for user logout process.
Implement micro-services for the creation of user groups.
Implement micro-services for listing users
Implement micro-services for managing user credentials according to current user rank and roles.
Implement micro-services to handle current user and current session.

task.title: Census of all required atomic operations

run.lit: All low level operations. The selection should go from the detailed to the more high level, the idea is to break down every required operation into a detailed flowchart that will allow enumerating all the required data and functional elements that are required for the task.
This activity should produce a list of atomic tasks that can be added to this plan

task.title: Census of all required descriptors for low level operations

run.lit: This activity should look at the result of “
Census of all required atomic operations”

and determine all necessary information items that are required to complete the task. Each of these items should translate into a descriptor, existing or new, that should be added to the structure spreadsheet which will be parsed and added to the database.

task.title: Census of all required classes for low level operations

run.lit: This activity takes the results of the “
Census of all required descriptors
” activity, along with the results of the “
Census of all required atomic operations
”, and uses them to compile the list of objects that are required to complete those tasks. This classes will be added to the “Symbols.numbers” file and later imported into the database.
This activity consists of noting whether atomic operations involve the use of new collections and assigning new classes to these collections.
Select, clean and compile list of standard data required for the project.
ISO 3166, ISO 639, ISO 4217, World Bank, Genoames, GEONet.

task.title: Update census of required descriptors from data standards..

run.lit: During the compilation of data standards, determine which descriptors are needed to handle the information and add to the descriptors spreadsheet the new ones and comment existing ones for usage in standards.
As new data standards classes are compiled, determine whether these should reside in collections other than
TERMS
. For instance the
Geonames
data should not be stored in
TERMS
, except for eventual enumerations and structures.
Implement JSX procedures to dynamically generate screen forms according to form definitions in the data dictionary.
Test and refine dynamic forms generation. Add required additional data elements to the data dictionary.

Implement signup form.
Implement procedures to send user registration invitation via e-mail.
Implement e-mail response and signin form.
Implement signin procedure.
Clone and modify signin form for user profile management.
Implement login form and procedure.
Implement logout procedure.
Implement micro-services for study registration.
Implement data dictionary elements for linking studies to other components in the application.
Implement micro-services for the management of studies.

task.title: Implement dataset parsing and registration micro-services

run.lit: Implement micro-services for creating working dataset collections.

task.title: Compile list of data cleaning procedures

run.lit: Perform analysis of all required data cleaning procedures to be performed during and after harmonisation.
Implement micro-services needed for data cleaning procedures.
Implement micro-services for data validation.
This will exclusively check if the data matches the expected data types.
Implement micro-services to analyse and match categorical data.
This applies to categorical data such as controlled vocabularies, it involves matching existing data to the descriptor and returning mismatches.
Implement micro-services to update existing standards by adding controlled vocabulary elements.
Implement micro-services to update existing data by matching elements in the controlled vocabulary.
Implement micro-services to display statistical summaries for quantitative data.
Implement micro-services to correct dataset values.
This involves displaying incorrect data (from the validation procedure) and providing the option of correcting invalid entries, or clearing invalid entries.
Implement interface for data cleaning operations.
Implement interface to display validation errors.
Implement interface to display categorical data matching.
Implement interface to add controlled vocabulary elements.
Implement interface to update existing data by matching elements in the controlled vocabulary.
Implement interface to display statistical summaries for quantitative data.
Implement interface to correct dataset values.
